publisher.publisher-name: The University of North Carolina Press

title-group.article-title: Too Far or Not Far Enough?
title-group.subtitle: Alain Badiou and the Hermeneutics of Small Moments

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © 2014 Society for Comparative Literature and the Arts
